MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Mold, affecting properties in a widespread area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 9:39 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because extensive line patrols are needed to locate the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 11:23 am on 22nd December, 2020.
